scripts.build: lerna run build --scope unity-ambient-x && npm run postbuild && lerna run build --scope unity-ambient-x-react
scripts.start: nodemon --watch packages/stencil-library/src -e js,ts,jsx,tsx,json,css --exec npm run build:watch
scripts.build:watch: lerna run build --scope unity-ambient-x && npm run postbuild && lerna run build --scope unity-ambient-x-react
